Posts.Content: I agree with the previous poster, go see the doc. But, my husbands friend also had a fatty deposit (that's what they called it) on his breast. They tested it and said it was fine to leave it there. So don't panic, but do have it checked.
Posts.Title: Male, 20's, small lump

Posts.Content: So sorry to hear your story. I just wanted to post that I had my first mammogram a few days ago and I COULD see how one could get injured. I hope everything turns out ok for you (your mom).
Posts.Title: Mammogram Injury
